entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `TransactionManager.ImplicitDistributedTransactions` #76469
  • Update HTTP/3 docs to 7.0 #76464
    7.0.0
  • Tracking issue for CI build timeouts #76454
  • [HTTP3] Initialize MsQuic only when HTTP3 will be used to send the request. #76445
  • Double(Single).Parse(string) and Double(Single).Parse(ReadOnlySpan<char) throws different exception for null #76442
  • [API Proposal]: Pattern matching with Span<char>/ ReadOnlySpan<char> with specified casing and culture #76441
  • JsonDocument.GetString implementation is not thread safe #76440
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Proxy disconnected on refresh #76438
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: QuicError.AddressNotAvailable #76435
  • [Performance] XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive is converting primitive types to string before writing them to the XmlWriter #76434
  • EventPipe sessions can leak the EventPipeThreadSessionState* associated with them #76430
    8.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection fails Bind() on Linux Systems for non-ASCII Passwords #76426
  • The DontFragment SocketOptionName doesn't appear to work on macOS #76422
  • superpmi unit test dependencies build issue #76421
    8.0.0
  • Quic Support Check Throws Exception Breaking ASP.NET core #76420
  • Linguistic apostrophe does not work with DateOnly.TryParseExact #76413
    Future

Closed

  • [mono] crash in class-setup-vtable with re-abstracted covariant returns #76312
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.InteropServices #72400
    7.0.0
  • ICorDebugThread2.InterceptCurrentException corrupts process in x64 Windows #75762
    7.0.0
  • CurrencySymbol wrong in .Net ^ #76437
  • NetworkInformationException when querying network interfaces in WSL 1 #75883
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 7 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #73866
    Future
  • JIT: get rid of shortName for phases #74768
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Xml.Linq.Perf_XName (FullPGO) #64626
    7.0.0
  • Generic method constrained by struct & interface can not see readonly modifier #76355
  • [Arm64] addressing mode inefficiencies in Guid:op_Equality(Guid,Guid):bool #35622
    Future
  • Address-exposure of promoted struct fields used by instance methods #76096
    8.0.0
  • Crash with unmanged DLL did not create a StackTrace in Eventlog #75245
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Authenticated ciphers should distigush between mismatched tag and failure #67082
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests failing due to missing a fix in 7.0 packages #76429
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AlpnInUse #74755
    8.0.0
  • QUIC: QuicListener not reporting address in use correctly #73045
    8.0.0
  • WASM CI failure: Wasm.Browser.Threads.Sample - SharedArrayBuffer is not defined, exit code 71, GENERAL_FAILURE #76331
  • Distributed Transactions (MSDTC) code blocking on disposal of Transaction Scope #76010
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.GetDtcTransaction #75822
  • Get System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests passing with NativeAOT #73145
    8.0.0
  • [arm64] Implement hot/cold splitting #10412
    Future
  • SPMI coreclr test collection issue #75931
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • System.Private.Xml AOT compatibility fixes #76473
    area-System.Xml, linkable-framework
  • Update jitrollingbuild.py #76472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76471
    area-Meta
  • Fix DEBUG/non-DEBUG SuperPMI asm diffs #76470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use System.CommandLine (v2) in dotnet-pgo #76467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove .dll from Interop.Libraries.HostPolicy for consistency with other runtime libraries #76466
    area-Host
  • [mono] Remove unused signature variable #76465
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Reinstate strict prototypes warning #76463
    community-contribution
  • [mbr] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [Android] Set target SDK version to 31 in AndroidAppBuilder #76461
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76459
    area-Meta
  • Cleaner way of specifying environment variables for tests #76458
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure NI_Vector256_GetLower has the right simdSize and improve codegen slightly #76456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] EmccExtraExportedRuntimeMethods MSBuild property #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][experiment] perf comparison jobs #76452
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Try changing alignment #76451
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0][mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76448
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Vector128's Sum and Dot SIMD implementation #76446
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid internal register allocation when possible for PUTARG_SPLIT #76443
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: A small CQ improvement for Equals/StartsWith unrolling #76439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [JIT] Fix potential division by zero in fgopt.cpp #76424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Explore adding an `ISimdVector<TSelf, T>` interface #76423
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reduce OrderBy overheads for default comparer #76418
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0

Merged

  • SuperPMI collections: exclude more files/directories #76384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BCrypt for ephemeral RSA on Windows #76277
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] Fix distribute free regions #76391
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76323
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Disable gen 1 budget accounting fix for segments #76412
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76393
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix edit and continue in VS with hardware exceptions #76427
    Servicing-approved, os-windows, arch-x64, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Enable logging managed stack trace for AV to event log #76428
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Distributed transaction fixes #76425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Quick disasm check CI JitStress fix #76417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase timeouts for runtime-dev-innerloop legs #76453
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT: Conversion for opcode conv_u4 is unsigned #76386
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76447
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Remove reliance on deactivated A64 queue #76457
  • Always expose parents of exposed promoted fields #76181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Removing short name column from compphases.h #76030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: increase slop tolerance when computing edge weights #76409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76433
    area-Build-mono
  • Support running Reflection tests within Visual Studio #75915
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Add a workaround for issue#76429 to fix CI #76432
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Pass --web-server-use-cop for threading samples #76419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #76383
    area-System.Net
  • Fix edit and continue in VS with hardware exceptions #76401
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Distributed transaction fixes #76310
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove the GenericComPlusCall mechanism #76415
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][jit] For beforefieldinit classes, only field accesses trigger … #76335
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove some dead code from Array.IndexOf #76388
    area-System.Runtime
  • Remove GT_ADDEX and replace with more generalized containment handling #76273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Don't cache the Compilation object in steps in the interop source generators #76474
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Pass local runtime timestamp from git into ci_setup #76396
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement ChaCha20Poly1305 with CryptoKit on macOS #76317
    area-System.Security
  • Tar: Use indexer setter instead of Add on ExtendedAttributes dictionary #76404
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76392
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76327
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Decommit small free regions when close to OutOfMemory #76216
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Bump the runtime net6 versions for GA #76270
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Test against iOS 16 and MacOS Ventura #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76407
    area-GC-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][sgen] Update memory load information after world is resumed #76400
    area-GC-mono
  • Add DiagnosticSource.Write<T> API to assist with trimming #76395
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Process primitives in local morph #76155
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • global.json: Bump sdk to 7.0.100-rtm.22476.1 to pick up a msbuild fix #76220
    NO-MERGE
  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76370
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Align parameter default value resolution between coreCLR, Mono and NativeAOT runtimes #75612
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Remove encoding allocations for System.Security.Xml #76364
    area-System.Security
  • Updating Vector256 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector128<T> ops #76221
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Pass-through all `scriptParsed` events, including those with empty URLs #76187
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] add missing API xml doc #76196
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests improvements #76381
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove unnecessary encoding allocations in System.Private.DataContractSerialization #76366
    area-Serialization
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • update arm32 test queues for msquic #76267
    arch-arm32, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76387
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
